name: CorridorVR Locomotion Demo
description:
Works with Meta Quest2

****This project requires walking space to work properly****

A 4+ meter corridor is recommended, but not required.  

This is a prototype demonstrating a locomotion method for walking in VR.  It is intended to make spatial locomotion more accessible, requiring only a Quest 2 and some space to walk in.  

Controls:

Left trigger:  Change walking direction

Grip buttons: Grab/Open Chests

Y/B button: Use item in hand slot

Abilities:  

-Reach out to suck up coins

-Hold palm up to summon fireball.  Grab and release to throw.

-Shoot energy arrows by bringing hands together, grabbing, pulling hands apart, and releasing. 

-Look at wrist to open inventory.  Items can be placed in slots, and items equipped in hand slots (closest to hand) can be used with the Y/B buttons.
